thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com | 2 of 119
thread.title: David Hudspith

author: David Hudspith
title: David Hudspith
text: Now here is a company that operates the way I like to see. Their customer service is fantastic, to the point that it inspires confidence in the rest of their service. The representatives I have spoken with were all knowledgeable and very open about the terms of their contract. I found their service easy to use and love the fact that my rep will call me any time I send him an email even though I am located in a different country. If I could I would give their service 6 stars because dealing with GoDaddy is as painless an experience as wearing silk undergarments :) If you're considering working with them then don't hesitate. That's my two cents at least.
